text: is a railway station in Tagawa, Fukuoka Prefecture, Japan. It is on the Ita Line, operated by the Heisei Chikuhō Railway. Trains arrive roughly every 30 minutes. ==Platforms== ==External links== *Shimoita Station (Heisei Chikuhō Railway website) ==References== Category:Railway stations in Fukuoka Prefecture Category:Railway stations in Japan opened in 1992 Category:Heisei Chikuhō Railway Ita Line
title: Shimoita Station
